did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Once Upon a Time at the University of Arizona 1916-1918
did.abstract: Holograph reminiscences of a former University of Arizona student in the College of Agriculture, describing events, the campus, the faculty and classmates. Accompanied by two letters to Dr. Harwood P. Hinton, transmitting his manuscript and giving additional information.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph reminiscences of a former University of Arizona student in the College of Agriculture, describing events, the campus, the faculty and classmates. Accompanied by two letters to Dr. Harwood P. Hinton, tranmitting his manuscript and giving additional information.
